channel.title: Teleblock problem
channel.description:
On my server some people type ::home and i teleblocked him why?? how i can fix the teleblock it work perfectl on my server but ppl still telly all i want to know its how to make work the teleblock effect...
~~SABSABI~~

item.title: Teleblock problem
item.dc:creator: @warlock_999 warlock 999
item.description:
@warlock_999 wrote:

this is for emote tabs

{ if(wildyLevel <= 20 && !teleblock && !CheckInCombat() && teleATimer == 0) { tele(2734,3468); sendMessage("welcome home"); teleATimer = 30; } else if (wildyLevel > 20) { sendMessage("You cannot teleport out above level 20 Wilderness."); } else if (CheckInCombat()) { sendMessage("You cannot teleport in combat"); } else if (teleblock) { sendMessage("You are teleblocked!"); } }
